org.ndnx.ndn.impl.encoding
Class TextXMLCodec

java.lang.Object
  org.ndnx.ndn.impl.encoding.TextXMLCodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
XMLCodec
public class TextXMLCodec
extends Object
implements XMLCodec

A text-based XML codec. Close to standard text XML, though with limited support for things like namespaces. This class contains utility functions used by TextXMLEncoder and TextXMLDecoder as well as setup to use this codec with XMLCodecFactory.

codecName

public static String codecName()
The name of this codec. Used to generate XMLEncoder and XMLDecoder instances with XMLCodecFactory.

Returns:
the codec name.

encodeBinaryElement

public static String encodeBinaryElement(byte[] element)
Encodes a binary element as base 64.

Parameters:
element - the element data to encode. Needs to handle null and 0-length elements
Returns:
the binary data base64 encoded into a String

encodeBinaryElement

public static String encodeBinaryElement(byte[] element,
                                         int offset,
                                         int length)
Encodes a binary element as base 64.

Parameters:
element - the element data to encode. Needs to handle null and 0-length elements
offset - the offset into element at which to start encoding
length - how many bytes of element to encode
Returns:
the binary data base64 encoded into a String

decodeBinaryElement

public static byte[] decodeBinaryElement(String element)
                                  throws IOException
Decodes a base64-encoded binary element back into a byte array.

Parameters:
element - base64-encoded element content
Returns:
the decoded byte array
Throws:
IOException - if element is not valid base64

formatDateTime

public static String formatDateTime(NDNTime dateTime)
Encapsulate our timestamp formatting/parsing for consistency. Use a simple standard format for outputing a quantized NDNTime.

Parameters:
dateTime - the timestamp to encode
Returns:
the formatted timestamp

parseDateTime

public static NDNTime parseDateTime(String strDateTime)
                             throws ParseException
Encapsulate our timestamp formatting/parsing for consistency. Use a simple standard format for outputing a quantized NDNTime.

Parameters:
strDateTime - the string-encoded timestamp
Returns:
the parsed timestamp as a NDNTime
Throws:
ParseException
